item.title: The street light at the back of our flat, 23rd August
item.description:
We have reported the faulty street light at the back of flats 56, 58,60 sedgmoor place. This makes the whole area pitch black and has led to unsavoury characters congregating at the back of the estate. It is a public safety issue at makes walking past there unsafe, plus all the flats have children living in them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous LED flash lighting on Thames Pathway, 23rd August
item.description:
Recently the lighting on the Thames Pathway behind King Stairs Close was replaced with LED lights with sensors that only light up 'in sequence'. The sensors only work for a 'flash' moment as you walk past. This creates a startle effect. The bigger problem with this is that the Pathway is in utter darkness until you enter it and you don't know who is there. It's a dangerous system and needs to be re-thought urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King Stairs Close, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
